hero.title: Full Truckload
hero.subtitle:
Dedicated Capacity.
Consistent Performance.
hero.description: At Trans Expert Inc., compliance isn’t an afterthought, it’s the foundation of how we operate. Our certifications are more than checkboxes; they are a daily commitment to safety, security, and performance.

strip.text:
Full truckload isn't just a mode, it's a commitment.
Our clients don’t just get a trailer, they get a team.

overlay.title: Why you need FTL?
overlay.description: Whether it’s recurring production shipments, large-scale retail fulfillment, or high-value cargo requiring minimal touchpoints, our FTL model is engineered for:
points: Direct-to-destination delivery with no intermediate handling
Reduced risk of damage or delay through load ownership
Dedicated equipment tailored to freight type and compliance needs

weAreDifferent.title: WE ARE DIFFERENT IN EVERY WAY
points: Load-specific documentation handling
Integrated cross-border compliance support
Advanced track & trace for real-time load status
Customized SLA options based on urgency and volume

hero.title: Temperature-Controlled Transport
hero.subtitle:
Precision Cooling.
Reliable Delivery.
hero.description: At Trans Expert Inc., we understand that temperature-sensitive cargo requires more than just refrigeration — it requires consistency, vigilance, and compliance at every mile. Our temperature-controlled transport services are purpose-built to protect your products from origin to destination.

strip.text:
Your cargo’s integrity is our reputation.
We don’t just deliver cold we deliver confidence.

overlay.title: Why you need Temperature-Controlled Transport?
overlay.description: Whether you're shipping pharmaceuticals, perishable foods, or other climate-sensitive materials, our solutions offer:
points: Real-time temperature monitoring and reporting
24/7 proactive response team for in-transit temperature deviations
Compliant with FDA, FSMA, and international cold chain standards

weAreDifferent.title: WE ARE DIFFERENT IN EVERY WAY
points: Load-specific documentation handling
Integrated cross-border compliance support
Advanced track & trace for real-time load status
Customized SLA options based on urgency and volume

hero.title: Cross-border Logistics
hero.subtitle:
Seamless Borders.
Limitless Reach.
hero.description: Navigating customs and compliance is complex. That’s why Trans Expert Inc. makes cross-border logistics feel local — with dedicated expertise, bilingual dispatchers, and end-to-end visibility across North America.

strip.text: Your freight doesn’t stop at the border. Neither do we.

overlay.title: Why you need Cross-border Logistics?
overlay.description: Whether it's regular import/export, specialized permits, or bonded shipments, our cross-border services ensure:
points: Expedited customs clearance with pre-approved programs (C-TPAT, FAST)
Dual-licensed drivers and bilingual communication
Real-time freight tracking across country lines
Compliance expertise with U.S., Canadian, and Mexican regulations

weAreDifferent.title: WE ARE DIFFERENT IN EVERY WAY
points: Load-specific documentation handling
Integrated cross-border compliance support
Advanced track & trace for real-time load status
Customized SLA options based on urgency and volume

hero.title: Cross-docking Solutions
hero.subtitle:
Faster Turnaround.
Leaner Supply Chains.
hero.description: In today’s fast-moving supply chain, minimizing warehouse dwell time is key. Our cross-docking solutions reduce handling, cut costs, and accelerate delivery — keeping your freight moving and your margins intact.

strip.text: We don’t just store freight. We keep it moving.

overlay.title: Why you need Cross-docking Solutions?
overlay.description: From retail replenishment to just-in-time manufacturing, our facilities and process are optimized for:
points: Immediate transfer from inbound to outbound shipments
Reduced warehousing costs and storage times
Strategically located cross-dock terminals
